name: Inkcups DL Series UV Ink For Glass
description: The DL Series UV ink for glass is the solution for glass and other substrates. This UV ink for glass can be utilized in either a UV flatbed inkjet printer or in a rotary inkjet printer. The DL series is cured using UV LED light and can be paired with primers for longer lasting adhesion. DL UV ink for glass works perfectly with MagiCoatÂ® glass primer to make glassware pieces more durable and resistant to wash cycles. In general, some type of pretreatment method for glass must be done prior to printing.
